This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record the use of an individual product to make a connection.
Pipe FW_102 and pipe FW_103 are both individual products. The pipefitting PF_99 that joins pipe FW_102 and pipe FW_103 is also an individual product.
The relationship between the pipefitting PF_99 and the connection between pipes FW_102 and FW_103, that indicates the pipefitting is used to make the connection, is an Involvement_of_individual_product_in_connection.
a relationship between:
a connection between individual products; and
an individual product,
that indicates the individual product is used to make the connection.
class of involvement of product in connection; Class of involvement of product in connection is within the scope of the Class_of_involvement_of_product_in_connection application module.
classification of a involvement of product in connection; Classification of an involvement of product in connection is within the scope of the Product_structure_and_Classification application module.
connection between individual products; Connections between individual products are within the scope of the Connection_of_individual_product application module.
The Involvement_of_individual_product_in_connection UoF identifies the use of an individual product to make a connection, and defines the connection and the individual product that is used.
